page.title: 12THE FIVE CABINET MAKERS.
page.content: {The Five Cabinet Makers}are one of 3 businesses on a site in the {West End {of Clevedon.}They employ five people and do not only make cabinets.They make spice racks and various other things.They have also made feet steadiers for handicapped people to keep their feet straight on wheelchairs.They send their products all round England and even to America. Clevedon is a good place to set up a business because the motorway is so near for transporting goods.It is also near big places like Bristol and Weston. The business has been going in Clevedon for about 25 years.They have plans to expand but are not sure when this will be.
